alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Twiggs, northwestern Bleckley and east central Houston Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 908 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tarversville, or 11 miles northwest of Cochran, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Royal, Tarversville and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central Georgia.
